about_the_game:
Floorball Practice

Step into the immersive world of Floorball Practice, the ultimate training ground for Floorball enthusiasts! Built on the cutting-edge Unreal Engine 5, this game pushes the boundaries of realism with ray tracing, lumen lighting, and highly detailed characters. Designed to fine-tune your Floorball skills, this Early Access title offers an open-world experience like no other—laying the foundation for the next phase in Floorball gaming.

Key Features

Explore an Open World

Travel through a sprawling open world featuring multiple Floorball halls connected by a train system. Venture into lush forests to jog or run, boosting your stamina while taking in stunning visuals across a dynamic weather system with a fully functioning day and night cycle.

Master Your Skills

  • Practice like a pro with objectives and skill-based activities designed to refine your Floorball techniques.

  • Practice shooting with customizable sticks, balls, rinks, goals, and Floorball fields—designed with gear you can unlock and arrange to your liking.

  • Unlock advanced animations and shooting finishes to perfect your style.

Customize Your Experience

  • Choose between male or female characters, with options for left- or right-handed playstyles.

  • Build your identity with a wide range of clothing, sticks, and training gear available through an in-game currency system.

  • Use the in-game phone system to order gear, set GPS destinations, manage playlists, and more.

Practice Alone or with a Friend

Switch seamlessly between first-person and third-person perspectives to fully immerse yourself in the action. Play solo, or share the Floorball journey with a friend or sibling in local split-screen multiplayer mode.

Dynamic Gameplay Systems

  • Stay energized with a drinking and eating system that adds a layer of realism to your training routine.

  • Experience licensed music tracks to create the perfect soundtrack for your practice sessions.

  • Level up your character as you progress, unlocking new abilities and expanding your potential on the field.

The Future of Floorball Gaming

Floorball Practice is just the beginning. This title serves as a stepping stone to Floorball Leagues, which will include full-sized matches, league systems, and much more. Get a head start on mastering your skills before competing on the grand stage when it launches in Early Access in 2028.

Prepare to practice, explore, and rise to greatness in Floorball Practice—arriving in Early Access in 2025.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: macOS 13 Ventura
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: macOS 15 Sequoia
  • Processor: Apple M2 Ultra
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M2 Ultra
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

name: Floorball Practice

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 Super (6GB) / AMD RX 590 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i9-13900K / AMD Ryzen 9 7900X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 4080 / AMD RX 7900 XTX
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Run, dribble, shoot, score—repeat! Unleash your inner pro through practice and determination. Hone your Floorball skills, level up, and upgrade your gear with advanced Floorball sticks, stylish clothing, and more.
